Name: Palash Das
Review:
Range, dynamic driver size and connection


Sound quality achha hai, sound ekdom Level na jadad high n low , stereo effect ke sath lofi sunne Mai or achha lagta hai,Abaj Kano mai chubti nhi hai,Touch Sensor bhi shi hai 1.5 sec ka dely hota hai matlab gana bhi badloge na turant nhi chalu hoga but utna chal jayega.Bulid quality se koi fark nahi padta, plastic ki body hai,hamy to gane se matlab hai.Case ke sath earbuds karib 1:30 hr mai charge ho jate hai.Earbuds 1 charge mai 3-3:30 hr chalta hai ,Or case me 3 time hi Charge deta hai earbuds.Earbud ko case se nikalte sath hi device se connect ho jata haiLekin Connectivity blu.5.0 rehne ke bad bhi mere bale blutooth mai connection break ho rha tha, bahut bar gana sunte bakt apne aap disconnect or contact ho rha tha.Range 10 m diya h lekin mujhe ji Mila tha usme range shi nhi tha 7,8 m mai hi connection break ho jaata thaEarbuds 13mm dynamic driver ka hai ,Jo ki mere Kan se thoda size m bada hai,to mujhe thoda dikkat hoi, lekin mere bhai ko shi Hui, Matlab Fitting achhi hai , Workout , Running kar sakte ho, Kan se nhi girenge

Name: Devil Boy
Review:
Avarage ‚îê( Àò_Àò)‚îå


* Sound Quality Mst He 50% Volume Bhi Jada Lagta He.* Bass Bhi Mst He.* Mic To Yesa He Agar Ham Kisi Se Bat Kar Rahe Honge Na Apni Avaj To Nahi Sunai Degi Jis Baat Kar Rahe He Pr Pice Jo Fan Ya Cooler Ya Ac Ki Avaj He Vo Jada Sunai DegiTo Matalb Aapne GF Ya BF Se Baat Nahi Kar Paoge.* Kabhi Kabhi Bina Kuch Calaye Shiii Shiii Avaj Si Ati He Or Video Ki Avaj Low Hote Hi Iski Avaj Nahi Ati Ruk Jata He Avaj.* Design Bhi Mst He Par KanüëÇMe Bhot Bada Lagta He Or Kan Me Se Nikal Jata He Yese Hi.* Vese 900rs Ke Hisab He Thik Thak He Dikat To He Par Calega.

Name: Yuvi
Review:
Value for money


Price wise ye product value for money hai lekin agar aap calls pe jyada bat krte ho to samne wale ko achhi sound quality nahi sunai degi.Music sunne ke liye achhe hain bass quality achhi hai aur touch controls bhi achhe hainCase ki quality jyada kuch khas nahi hai, scratch bahut jaldi aa jaege or build quality bhi halki hai gir gye to toot skte hain.Earbuds achhe se ear me fit ho jate hain or comfortable hain.Battery backup thik thak hai.

Name: Mahesh
Review:
Best Quality ,Sound ,Design And Reasonable Price


Iska Design bhut classic hai and material bhi achiquality me hai.  Color bhi acha hai Ptron ka mate finishing hai. Sound quality or bass  no 1 hai. Ears me  ache se Fit ho jaate hai  Ears me pain hone ki koi problm nhi hoti hai and  iska bettery backup Bhut hi acha hai  4 -5 hours tak Continue song sun sakate hai. Noise Cancellation  best hai and range 10 m tak ache se Cover kr leta hai. Iski Touch quality  achi hai call attend krne m and song change krne m  koi problm nhi aati hai and calling m voice quality  best hai  ache se Clear voice aati hai or iski  price range reasonable hai Is range me earbuds isse ache  nhi mil sakte.

Buds not working


Third class product. I bought two different Ptron products.After 3 to 4 months both stopped working.  Kai mail karne ke bad company ne usmese ek ko Hyderabad bhejne ko kaha. Pahunchne ke 15/20 din unhone dusra old faulty product replacement me bhej diya.jo chalta hi nahi.Dusre product ke liye 30 Oct se mail kar raha hu par abhi tak to koi reply nahi.Ptron koi branded product nahi...  Don't buy
